name: MedicareNewBeneficiaryAndAnnualAdultPreventiveCareVisitHCPCS
title: Medicare New Beneficiary and Annual Adult Preventive Care Visit (HCPCS)
description: This value set includes HCPCS codes for Medicare new beneficiary wellness exam and initial and subsequent annual preventive care visits.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set includes HCPCS codes for Medicare new beneficiary wellness exam and initial and subsequent annual preventive care visits.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have received preventive care services. This element may map to the "Encounter" Category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes preventive care visits for Medicare beneficiaries. Includes both the initial exam post Medicare enrollment, and both initial and subsequent routine annual exams.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes preventive care visits not coded as having occurred as part of the Medicare plan.)

concept.display: Initial preventive physical examination; face-to-face visit, services limited to new beneficiary during the first 12 months of medicare enrollment
Annual wellness visit; includes a personalized prevention plan of service (pps), initial visit
Annual wellness visit, includes a personalized prevention plan of service (pps), subsequent visit
